comment.body: I think we need to do mass training on how to create a zite and run it and maintain it. I am new here but not new to open source. Working on 20 + years of it so far on the Linux distro side. However like with new technology we need great teachers to pass on the knowledge that they created. And last but not least.. MARKETING, MARKETING, MARKETING! But not just on Zeronet we need it on clear net.

I think we need to create a Zeronet user group. Similar function to what you are proposing but will deal with help questions about zeronet. Group volunteers can be anyone who has the time to participate in making Zeronet a better community for everyone.

> [geekless](#comment_2_1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4gjkq4): By the way, I read the same idea on the Russian ZeroNet forum yesterday.
> What platform do you want to run it on?

Not sure what you mean by what platform. There are lots of platforms.. lol..
